name: Happy Birthdays
description: From legendary creator Mr. Yasuhiro Wada (TOYBOX Inc.) comes Happy Birthdays: a sandbox game in which players create cube-shaped worlds that give rise to diverse and unique lifeforms. With careful experimentation, players can shape the geography and alter the temperature of the world to create the conditions for life and witness the birth of an entire ecosystem!
intro:
The World is in Your Hands!

Watch as creatures big and small 
grow in your world!

Features a 20-page World Guide 
full of fascinating creatures! 

Ocean and mountains! Tundras and deserts! 
If you can shape it, you can make it!
